app.title: Food Ingredient Scanner
app.subtitle: Check your food for harmful ingredients

auth.joinUs: Join us to start protecting your health with smart ingredient scanning
auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account
auth.termsConditions: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
auth.resetPasswordSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox and spam folder.

scanner.title: Ingredient Scanner
scanner.subtitle: Detect harmful additives instantly
scanner.scanDescription: Take a photo of any ingredient label to instantly detect harmful additives
scanner.pleaseWait: Please wait while we scan your image
scanner.freePreview: Free preview - Sign up for full results
scanner.tryTextRecognition: Try our text recognition technology! Take a photo of any text and see how accurately we can read it.
scanner.noText: No text detected in the image
scanner.demoNote: This is a demonstration of our text recognition technology. The full app includes ingredient analysis and health warnings.
scanner.signUpMessage: Sign up to see detailed ingredient analysis, health warnings, and personalized recommendations
scanner.whatYouGet: What you get with a free account:

landing.scanForFree: Scan any ingredient label for free
landing.scanNowSignUp: Scan ingredients now - sign up to see full results
landing.harmfulIngredientsDetected: We found harmful ingredients! Create a free account to see detailed results and protect your health.
landing.unlimitedScans: Create a free account to unlock unlimited scans and detailed ingredient analysis
landing.scanDescription: Take a photo and get results instantly
landing.protectDescription: Detect harmful ingredients before you consume
landing.sameLogin: Use the same login for both apps
landing.cosmeticsDescription: Scan cosmetics and personal care products to detect harmful chemicals in makeup, skincare, and beauty products.

createList.title: Create Custom List
createList.subtitle: Build your personal ingredient blacklist
createList.instruction: Create your personalized list of unwanted ingredients. Add items one by one, then save your custom blacklist to use during scanning.
createList.listSaved: Your custom list has been saved successfully!
createList.ingredientExists: This ingredient is already in your list
createList.addAtLeastOne: Add at least one ingredient before saving
createList.listDeleted: Your custom list has been deleted!
createList.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete all ingredients from your list?
createList.emptyStateDescription: Start building your custom ingredient blacklist by adding ingredients above

myList.title: My Personal List
myList.subtitle: Scan with your custom ingredient list
myList.goToCreateList: Go to "Create List" to build your personal ingredient blacklist
myList.noItemsDetected: No items from your list detected!
myList.usePersonalBlacklist: Use your personal blacklist to scan ingredient labels! If you haven't created one yet, go to the 'Create List' tab.

account.chooseAction: Choose what you'd like to do with your account
account.deleteWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.acceptTerms: Please accept the terms and conditions
errors.weakPassword: The password provided is too weak
errors.emailInUse: An account already exists for that email
errors.userNotFound: No user found for that email
errors.signInError: An error occurred. Please try again
errors.signUpError: An error occurred. Please try again
errors.resetPasswordError: Failed to send reset email. Please try again
errors.signOutError: Error signing out. Please try again
errors.deleteAccountError: Error deleting account. You may need to sign in again
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many reset attempts. Please try again later.
